job_description:
Role Overview
We are seeking experienced educators to contribute to a new research initiative aimed at advancing next-generation educational systems. You will collaborate with researchers to design, evaluate, and refine teaching-related materials and workflows that reflect real-world classroom practices.

Key Responsibilities
- Develop and review authentic teaching scenarios and lesson-based tasks.
- Design and assess teaching-style prompts, outputs, and instructional content.
- Provide constructive feedback on logic, clarity, and educational relevance.
- Collaborate with researchers and educators to improve project quality and structure.

Ideal Qualifications
- 3+ years of full-time teaching experience at the middle or high school level in the U.S. or Canada.
- Strong written communication, analytical, and research skills.
- Ability to collaborate effectively and adapt to evolving project requirements.
- Passion for education, learning design, and academic rigor.

Work Details
- Fully remote and asynchronous — flexible working environment.
- Independent contractor engagement.

Compensation: $50–$70/hour USD (with top performer bonuses up to $100/hour)
